name: The Followers Game
description:
The Followers Game, a game where you try to guess who has more Twitter followers out of the most popular. Simple as that, with different categories from sports, to media, to celebrities, to everything, (only on Android version) you'll have a challenge. Get one right, get a point and gather up a highscore. 

This game is always being developed, with over 100 accounts so far and I'll always be adding more as time goes on.

ENJOY!!!!!
